name: Redd: A Tale of Shadows - Demo
name_original: Redd: A Tale of Shadows - Demo
description:
The game I created for my senior capstone project at Kutztown Univeristy, as a game development major. This version is a prototype that I hope to expand upon in the future.

(Game is optimized to be played with a controller. K+M controls work and can be used, but for the best experience while playing a controller is recommended.)
